About Me

My real name is Chenlei(陈磊), my online name is chenfucaijun(陈府才俊), you can call me Jackchen. Now I am currently studying for a software engineering master’s degree at Communication University of China . I have an Computer Science degree in Anhui Normal University,and have won several scholarships .
In spare time, I like reading book, surfing internet, watching movie and taking a leisurely walk outdoors.
